docs.lead_paragraph: The wife of embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon said in an interview on Sunday that the work she had carried out for him was real and that she wanted him to continue his campaign until the end.

headline.print_headline: French Presidential Candidate Fillon's Wife Says He Should Battle On
headline.main: French Presidential Candidate Fillon's Wife Says He Should Battle On

docs.snippet: The wife of embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon said in an interview on Sunday that the work she had carried out for him was real and that she wanted him to continue his campaign until the end....

docs.lead_paragraph: Now that Johnathan Motley helped destroy Texas again, the Baylor junior is looking forward to a more historic challenge.

docs.snippet: Now that Johnathan Motley helped destroy Texas again, the Baylor junior is looking forward to a more historic challenge....

docs.lead_paragraph: Kellyn Acosta scored in the 69th minute and FC Dallas beat the Los Angeles Galaxy 2-1 in a Major League Soccer opener Saturday.

headline.main: Acosta Scores in 69th, FC Dallas Beats LA Galaxy 2-1

docs.lead_paragraph: A hole-in-one boosted Justin Thomas to the lead after a wild third round at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City on Saturday, but three of the biggest names in the game are breathing down his neck.

headline.print_headline: No Doubting Thomas as Ace Boosts Him to WGC Lead
headline.main: No Doubting Thomas as Ace Boosts Him to WGC Lead

docs.snippet: A hole-in-one boosted Justin Thomas to the lead after a wild third round at the WGC-Mexico Championship in Mexico City on Saturday, but three of the biggest names in the game are breathing down his neck....

docs.lead_paragraph: World indoor pole vault record holder Jenn Suhr withdrew from the U.S. championships on Saturday, saying she was frustrated with how American title meets are conducted.

headline.print_headline: Athletics: Suhr Withdraws From U.S. Champs, Upset at How Meets Run
headline.main: Athletics: Suhr Withdraws From U.S. Champs, Upset at How Meets Run

docs.snippet: World indoor pole vault record holder Jenn Suhr withdrew from the U.S. championships on Saturday, saying she was frustrated with how American title meets are conducted....

docs.lead_paragraph: The production, written by Canadians, is about a town in Newfoundland that embraced air travelers who were stranded there after the Sept. 11 attacks.

headline.print_headline: Prime Minister to See Canadian Broadway Musical
headline.main: Justin Trudeau to Attend the Broadway Musical ‘Come From Away’

docs.snippet: The production, written by Canadians, is about a town in Newfoundland that embraced air travelers who were stranded there after the Sept. 11 attacks....

docs.lead_paragraph: Justin Thomas hit a 6-iron that one-hopped into the bottom of the cup. Dustin Johnson hit a wedge that never came down from a tree. In one of the 10 fairways that Phil Mickelson missed, a spectator apparently ran off with his golf ball.

headline.main: Justin Thomas Makes an Ace and Takes Lead in Mexico

docs.lead_paragraph: Florida State's 66-57 victory over No. 25 Miami on Saturday gives the 15th-ranked Seminoles a double-bye in the Atlantic Coast Conference Tournament and their first unbeaten home season in 41 years.

headline.print_headline: No. 15 Florida State Earns Second Seed in ACC Tournament
headline.main: No. 15 Florida State Earns Second Seed in ACC Tournament

docs.snippet: Florida State's 66-57 victory over No. 25 Miami on Saturday gives the 15th-ranked Seminoles a double-bye in the Atlantic Coast Conference Tournament and their first unbeaten home season in 41 years....

docs.lead_paragraph: San Francisco Giants coach Jose Alguacil needed surgery to repair a broken nose after being hit by a foul ball during a spring training game.
